text: Johan Tjitze van Minnen (31 October 1932 â€“ 18 April 2016) was a Dutch journalist and politician. He was a foreign correspondent in first Luxembourg and later West Germany. From 1975 and 1978, he was the ombudsman of the television show De Ombudsman. Van Minnen served as a member of the European Parliament for the Labour Party between 1979 and 1984. Van Minnen died on 18 April 2016 in Zeist, Netherlands, aged 83. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Dutch journalists Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:MEPs for the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Friesland Category:Writers from Friesland
title: Johan van Minnen
